"I was always looking up to him. He made me feel so safe. I was so proud to be his daughter."
"What do you think? Of this, as proof that my Dad and his crew fought here?"
"Listen, thanks for tagging along with me today."
"This isn't like a reward or anything, just a token of my appreciation. Take it."
"I've gotta keep giving it my best effort. My Dad would give me a lecture if I didn't."
"So let's keep pushing each other forward!"
